Posts.Content: Hello, I am currently on carbogem and it seems to be working on my liver mets. I do have bone mets, but they have never bothered me. I have joint pain, low back pain, and soreness since I started this combo. Now I am afraid its bone mets. The low back pain is not constant-just when I move around. I also have morphed into triple negative according to a liver biopsy I had in the spring. I was first diagnosed in 1998. I also had a tram flap done.
Posts.Title: Ask the Expert: Breast cancer oncologist Dr. Bora Lim returns
